items.title: Why Adam Grant Recommends Giving Bad Interview Candidates Another Shot
items.description: The Wharton organizational psychologist recommends businesses give wobbly applicants a “do-over” to see how they handle job-related tasks.

items.title: Melinda French Gates Just Donated $250 Million to Support Women’s Health
items.description: More than 80 nonprofits received funding after French Gates committed to donating $1 billion over two years for women’s rights.
